post.body: you totally could, I'm pretty average, and that's on easy.. Hand cramps
it's a no smegma, oh how I enjoy calling u smegma. Seems fitting!
not a chance.. My husband might send u a pic of his, should I ask for u LOL
take pics of what?
he's cute Chris, but what does 'scene' mean? *feels dumb and uncool for asking*
took me to the feeding trough that is sizzler

1hr 44min to go til 2009
At home, atmosphere at Brothers non existant, might just rock out with some guitar hero
Toast and tea for breakfast, what's next? Trip to the shops perhaps
Time for bed.. Goodnight global pervs and goodnight to my local twinkleserfs ;)
Headache again, maybe too much reading? Needs someone to read me a bedtime story.
Read 'Scarpetta' today. It was good, not brilliant but it kept me reading.
Inside the sizzler dome... Gps can't find me

Saw bedtime stories earlier today, wasn't that impressed
